name: Jamie Jennings
body: That you took pics of your first oil change is hilarious! But I’m really posting this comment to get in touch, because I think I knew you at CU, where I worked for Bruce and Dan. I had a different name then, and looked different, though! We took a motorcycle ride together once, but that was before you had a license, I think. I had a CBR600. Drop me an email sometime!
